mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Follows up letter of 1820 April 13 with additional discussion on the life and character of Jesus Christ, justifying the latter "against the fictions of his pseudo-followers"; urges "cordial fraternization among all American nations"; invites Short to visit.

mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1820 August 4, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to William Short, Shrewsbury, New Jersey.
